title: Sonlar bilan tanishish
content: Sonlar bizning hayotimizda juda muhim. Ular narsalarni sanash va miqdorini aniqlash uchun ishlatiladi.

title: Qo'shish va Ayirish
content: Qo'shish - bu ikki miqdorni bitta butunga birlashtirish jarayoni.

title: Ko'paytirish
content: Ko'paytirish - bu bir xil sonlarni bir necha marta qo'shishning qisqacha usulidir.

title: Bo'lish
content: Bo'lish - bu butunni teng qismlarga taqsimlash jarayoni.

title: Alphabet & Greetings
content: Language learning starts with the alphabet and basic greetings like 'Hello' and 'Hi'.
example: A is for Apple, B is for Boy.

title: Numbers & Counting
content: Learning numbers in English is essential for everyday conversations.
